eventDecorators.name: DeploymentApprovalGranted
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: DeploymentApprovalRevoked
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: ManyToOne_ImplementationCreated
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: ManyToOne_ImplementationLocked
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: ManyToOne_ImplementationUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: ManyToOne_ProxyDeployed
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: OneToOne_ImplementationLocked
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: OneToOne_ImplementationUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: OneToOne_ProxyDeployed
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Funds have been received. activate liquidity.

functionDecorators.name: approveDeployer
functionDecorators.description: Allows `deployer` to deploy many-to-one proxies.

functionDecorators.name: computeHolderAddressManyToOne
functionDecorators.description: Computes the create2 address of the implementation holder for `implementationID`.

parameterDecorators.name: implementationID
parameterDecorators.description: The identifier for the contract implementation.

functionDecorators.name: computeProxyAddressManyToOne
functionDecorators.description: Computes the create2 address for a many-to-one proxy for the implementation `implementationID` requested by `originator` using `suppliedSalt`.

parameterDecorators.name: originator
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the account requesting deployment.

parameterDecorators.name: implementationID
parameterDecorators.description: The identifier for the contract implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: suppliedSalt
parameterDecorators.description: Salt provided by the account requesting deployment.

functionDecorators.name: computeProxyAddressOneToOne
functionDecorators.description: Computes the create2 address for a one-to-one proxy requested by `originator` using `suppliedSalt`.

parameterDecorators.name: originator
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the account requesting deployment.

parameterDecorators.name: suppliedSalt
parameterDecorators.description: Salt provided by the account requesting deployment.

functionDecorators.name: createManyToOneProxyRelationship
functionDecorators.description: Creates a many-to-one proxy relationship. Deploys an implementation holder contract which stores the implementation address for many proxies. The implementation address can be updated on the holder to change the runtime code used by all its proxies.

parameterDecorators.name: implementationID
parameterDecorators.description: ID for the implementation, used to identify the proxies that use it. Also used as the salt in the create2 call when deploying the implementation holder contract.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address with the runtime code the proxies should use.

functionDecorators.name: deployProxyManyToOne
functionDecorators.description: Deploy a proxy with a many-to-one relationship with its implemenation. The proxy will call the implementation holder for every transaction to determine the address to use in calls.

parameterDecorators.name: suppliedSalt
parameterDecorators.description: Salt provided by the account requesting deployment.

functionDecorators.name: deployProxyOneToOne
functionDecorators.description: Deploy a proxy contract with a one-to-one relationship with its implementation. The proxy will have its own implementation address which can be updated by the proxy manager.

parameterDecorators.name: suppliedSalt
parameterDecorators.description: Salt provided by the account requesting deployment.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the contract with the runtime code that the proxy should use.

functionDecorators.name: getImplementationHolder
functionDecorators.description: Queries the temporary storage value `_implementationHolder`. This is used in the constructor of the many-to-one proxy contract so that the create2 address is static (adding constructor arguments would change the codehash) and the implementation holder can be stored as a constant.

functionDecorators.name: getImplementationHolder
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the implementation holder contract for `implementationID`.

functionDecorators.name: isApprovedDeployer
functionDecorators.description: Returns a boolean stating whether `deployer` is allowed to deploy many-to-one proxies.

functionDecorators.name: isImplementationLocked
functionDecorators.description: Returns a boolean stating whether `implementationID` is locked.

functionDecorators.name: isImplementationLocked
functionDecorators.description: Returns a boolean stating whether `proxyAddress` is locked.

functionDecorators.name: lockImplementationManyToOne
functionDecorators.description: Lock the current implementation for `implementationID` so that it can never be upgraded again.

functionDecorators.name: lockImplementationOneToOne
functionDecorators.description: Lock the current implementation for `proxyAddress` so that it can never be upgraded again.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: revokeDeployerApproval
functionDecorators.description: Prevents `deployer` from deploying many-to-one proxies.

functionDecorators.name: setImplementationAddressManyToOne
functionDecorators.description: Updates the implementation address for a many-to-one proxy relationship.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address with the runtime code the proxies should use.

functionDecorators.name: setImplementationAddressOneToOne
functionDecorators.description: Updates the implementation address for a one-to-one proxy. Note: This could work for many-to-one as well if the caller provides the implementation holder address in place of the proxy address, as they use the same access control and update mechanism.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address with the runtime code for the proxy to use.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
